ygData.subject: Re: SV: Tinkering skill cap, fixed?
ygData.msgSnippet: I asked a GM the same question and he also replied that no changes were made to tinkering in the last patch.  Guess we have to wait a little longer... QdP ...
ygData.messageBody:
I asked a GM the same question and he also replied that no changes were
made to tinkering in the last patch. Guess we have to wait a little
longer...

QdP

--- Zinken <zinken@...> wrote:
> No you cant, they didnt fix it in the server patch. I petitioned again
> about it but the only one i got an anwser from was an aprentice guide.
> And you all know how much they can help you.
>
> But he thought that when they fix it we are gonna see a msg about it, so
> keep on petition about this until they fix it.
>
>
> Askur of Veeshan
>
